g.text: AI AGENT CONTROL SURFACE // TOP VIEW
WIRED USB-C // BUS POWERED // 9 LCD BUTTONS
Rendering: Dynamic icons via C# SDK BitmapBuilder
Actions: CommandAction per button, real-time update
Commit, Push, PR, Approve, Reject, Dictate, Test, Build, Deploy
Explain, Refactor, Review, Search, Docs, Types, Scaffold, Fix, Undo
Staging, Prod, Rollback, Logs, Status, Migrate, Seed, Env, Health
Dictate, Standup, Issue, Snippet, Changelog, Notify, Ticket, Recap, Handoff
Plugin actions auto-populate the ring picker
Haptic feedback on hover and select (15 waveforms)

svg.text: WISPY CONSOLE // UNIVERSAL AI AGENT CONTROL SURFACE // LOGITECH ACTIONS SDK // HAUSOR LABS 2026
